UserSetting.account_settings_description: Manage your account settings and profile information.

UserProfile.title: Profile
UserProfile.description: This is how others will see you on the site.
UserProfile.usernameChangeWarning: Username can only be changed once.
UserProfile.displayNameDescription: Please enter your full name, or a display name you are comfortable with.
UserProfile.imageTooLargeError: File is too large. Please select an image smaller than 5MB.
UserProfile.displayNameMaxLength: Display name must be at most 50 characters.
UserProfile.usernameMinLength: Username must be at least 3 characters.
UserProfile.usernameMaxLength: Username must be at most 20 characters.
UserProfile.usernamePattern: Username can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, underscores, and dots.
UserProfile.bioMaxLength: Bio must be at most 160 characters.

UserPassword.title: Password
UserPassword.description: Change your password by sending a reset link to your email.
UserPassword.checkInboxDescription: A password reset link has been sent to {email}. Please follow the instructions in the email to set a new password.
UserPassword.resetLinkSent: A password reset link has been sent to your email.

UserSocialLinks.title: Social Links
UserSocialLinks.description: Add links to your website and social media profiles.
UserSocialLinks.invalidXUrl: Please enter a valid X (Twitter) URL.
UserSocialLinks.invalidGithubUrl: Please enter a valid GitHub URL.
UserSocialLinks.invalidLinkedinUrl: Please enter a valid LinkedIn URL.
UserSocialLinks.invalidFacebookUrl: Please enter a valid Facebook URL.

VerifyEmailPage.tokenMissingError: Verification token is missing. Please check the link in your email.
VerifyEmailPage.verificationSuccess: Your email has been successfully verified! You can now use all features.
VerifyEmailPage.title: Email Verification

ResetPasswordPage.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters.
ResetPasswordPage.passwordLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
ResetPasswordPage.passwordUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
ResetPasswordPage.passwordNumber: Password must contain at least one number.
ResetPasswordPage.passwordSpecialChar: Password must contain at least one special character.
ResetPasswordPage.tokenMissingError: Reset token is missing. Please use the link from your email.
ResetPasswordPage.resetSuccess: Your password has been reset successfully! Please log in.
ResetPasswordPage.tokenNotFoundMessage: Password reset token not found. Please make sure you have the correct link.
ResetPasswordPage.title: Reset Your Password
ResetPasswordPage.webSiteTermAndPrivacy: By clicking continue, you agree to our <terms>Terms of Service</terms> and <privicy>Privacy Policy</privicy>.

RegisterPage.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters.
RegisterPage.passwordLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
RegisterPage.passwordUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
RegisterPage.passwordNumber: Password must contain at least one number.
RegisterPage.passwordSpecialChar: Password must contain at least one special character.
RegisterPage.agreementRequired: You must accept the terms and conditions.
RegisterPage.title: Create an account
RegisterPage.description: Enter your details below to create your account.
RegisterPage.agreementLabel: I agree to the terms and conditions
RegisterPage.webSiteTermAndPrivacy: By clicking continue, you agree to our <terms>Terms of Service</terms> and <privicy>Privacy Policy</privicy>.

LoginPage.title: Login to your account to continue.
LoginPage.description: Enter your email below to login to your account.
LoginPage.webSiteTermAndPrivacy: By clicking continue, you agree to our <terms>Terms of Service</terms> and <privicy>Privacy Policy</privicy>.

ForgotPasswordPage.title: Forgot Password
ForgotPasswordPage.description: Enter your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
ForgotPasswordPage.resetLinkSentSuccess: If an account with that email exists, a password reset link has been sent.
ForgotPasswordPage.webSiteTermAndPrivacy: By clicking continue, you agree to our <terms>Terms of Service</terms> and <privicy>Privacy Policy</privicy>.

SignOutPage.title: Sign Out
SignOutPage.description: Are you sure you want to sign out of your account?
SignOutPage.signOutError: There was an error signing out.

PublicUserProfile.userNotFoundDescription: The user you are looking for does not exist.
PublicUserProfile.metaDescription: Check out the profile and submissions of {name} on {appName}.
